title: Title update + certificate download gating by completion

requirements.summary: Set the HTML document title to the requested game name.
acceptanceCriteria: After reload, the browser tab title displays "Barnabus, The Undeterred".

file_operations.description: Replace the existing <title> text so it is exactly "Barnabus, The Undeterred".

requirements.summary: Remove Wall of Fame testing behavior so the certificate download button only appears for completed players.
acceptanceCriteria: If hasCompleted is false, HallOfFameView does not render the "Download Your Certificate" button at all.
If hasCompleted is true, HallOfFameView renders the "Download Your Certificate" button.

file_operations.description: Remove the testing logic that always shows the download button; conditionally render the "Download Your Certificate" Button only when hasCompleted === true (using the local completion flag from usePersistentPlayerId).

requirements.summary: Generate certificates from the completed player's own Wall of Fame entry and disable download when no matching entry exists.
acceptanceCriteria: When hasCompleted is true and the player’s entry exists in the fetched entries, clicking the button downloads a certificate for that player’s name.
When hasCompleted is true but no playerEntry is found, the button is rendered but disabled.

file_operations.description: Update certificate download behavior to use playerEntry (matched by playerId) instead of the last entry; wire the button disabled state to !playerEntry while still rendering it when hasCompleted === true; update the click handler to no-op unless playerEntry exists and generateCertificatePdf is called with playerEntry.name.
